channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Flow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Flow

item.title: CVE-2024-34600|2024-07-02T09:23:40.666Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20flow
item.description: Improper verification of intent by broadcast receiver vulnerability in Samsung Flow prior to version 4.9.13.0 allows local attackers to copy image files to external storage.
